headline.main: Caramoor Festival Opens Up Its Tent
headline.sub: Director Broadens  The Roster  Of Performers ;
headline.print_headline: Caramoor Festival Opens Up Its Tent

docs.snippet: MICHAEL BARRETT has such an easygoing presence that it's hard to imagine him stirring the pot. But, five years into his tenure as chief executive officer of the Caramoor International Music Festival in Katonah, N.Y., that's precisely what he has...
docs.lead_paragraph: MICHAEL BARRETT has such an easygoing presence that it's hard to imagine him stirring the pot. But, five years into his tenure as chief executive officer of the Caramoor International Music Festival in Katonah, N.Y., that's precisely what he has done. When Mr. Barrett took the helm in July 2003, standard presentations of the core classical repertory dominated the festival's fare. In its 63rd season, which opens on Saturday, nearly a third of the 38 concerts will deviate in some way from that formula. And the audiences will be about 15 percent larger than they were before he took over, he said.

headline.main: Caramoor Festival Opens Up Its Tent
